import React from "react"; import "./css/Header.css"; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCart"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {useStateValue} from './StateProvider'; import { ShoppingBasket } from "@material-ui/icons"; function Header() { const [{basket},dispatch]=useStateValue(); return (
Hello Sign in
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
); } export default Header;
